knimeNode.name: Add Date
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds date information to a time cell.

fullDescription.intro: Adds a fixed date to cells which contain only a time. Optionally a default time zone can be added too.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only to the included columns a date will be added.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Add Date
tab.option: The fixed day (a value between 1 and 31)
If checked, a time zone will be added to the date.
If Add time zone is checked, the user can choose the time zone here.
